title: MVP & Rapid Prototyping
description: Launch market-ready MVPs in 3–4 weeks with Clow’s no-code and low-code expertise.
overview: Clow specializes in building minimum viable products (MVPs) to validate your concept quickly and affordably. We use no-code tools like Bubble and FlutterFlow, low-code backends like Pocketbase, and custom code for complex features.
At $25/hour, we deliver scalable prototypes in 3–4 weeks, leveraging AI-powered development and open-source tools to ensure you own your code and avoid vendor lock-in.

tools.name: Bubble
tools.description: No-code platform for building web applications with a visual interface.

tools.name: Pocketbase
tools.description: Open-source backend for building real-time applications.

tools.name: Prisma
tools.description: Next-generation ORM for Node.js and TypeScript, simplifying database access.

tools.name: Zapier
tools.description: Automation tool to connect different apps and services.

tools.name: Framer
tools.description: Design tool for creating interactive prototypes and animations.

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We define your MVP’s scope and select the best tools in week 1.

process.title: Design & Prototyping
process.description: We build a functional prototype with your UI/UX vision in weeks 2–3.

process.title: Development & Testing
process.description: We add custom code, integrate APIs, and test in week 3.

process.title: Launch & Handover
process.description: We deploy on your cloud and hand over full ownership in week 4.
